input.name: __VIEWSTATE

div.span: Our teams continue to work very hard to provide ongoing instruction and nutrition to our students
Thus said, we have yet another minor change to announce relative to meal distribution.
For Monday, April 13, our meal distribution will remain "pick-up only" and will continue at the same two sites: Sherman Elementary and Grant County High School. (
MCE and DRE area families should pick up at Grant County High School; while CMZ and SES area families should pick-up at Sherman Elementary.)

span.span: The pick-up times, however, will change.
Both sites will have teams available to assist with pick-up during two time slots.
Families may choose to pick-up food, either:

span.style: font-family: Arial; color: #ff0000; text-decoration-line: underline; font-size: 20px

span.span: Families may pick up their food at

span.style: font-size: 16px; font-family: Arial; color: #ff0000; text-decoration-line: underline
font-size: 16px; font-family: Arial; color: #ff0000; text-decoration-line: underline
font-size: 16px; font-family: Arial; color: #ff0000; text-decoration-line: underline

div.span: As before, signage and personnel will direct you to the pick-up spots (which will be toward the rear at both locations). We request that families remain in their cars and simply pop their trunks. They should indicate the number of children, 18 and under, in their household, and the appropriate number of meals will deposited in their trunk.
Thank you for your cooperation and consideration as we navigate this together.
